Summary Heading: For what it is, surprisingly good
Summary: I booked a room here in case I needed to be able to stop and reset on a Sunday and turn back around to San Diego on Monday... I picked this hotel because literally every single errand I would need to do Sunday afternoon could be accomplished on the same block across the street after check-in and there were some photos on Google that didn't look like a crime scene. I didn't have to stay over but wanted to check out the motel anyway for future trips back and forth as I was headed past... I was pleasantly surprised... The rooms are recently refurbished, clean, and well-maintained. The outside is clean and freshly painted. The desk clerk was polite, friendly, and offered great customer service.  I would have been comfortable staying overnight. I can see where the outside would be a
Room tip: Ask for a room up by the office, park near the front.

Summary: Let's see. Neighborhood: BAD. I did not feel the safest in that neighborhood. I guess the worst of it was THE A/C DID NOT WORK. No plug for the sink drain. Inadequate towels upon arrival (this was supposed to be for TWO people...ONE TOWEL ????? Seriously????? And they just raised their rates??? One saving "grace" was there was a Starbuck's across the street that was very nice.
Room tip: STAY AWAY. Pay a little extra for some comfort.

Summary: me and my best friend had had the chance to  finally get hotel room in who how long we both had descent chance to only relax after having deal.  anyways we book this place thur hotwire and we not only gotta good deal with the two  nights stay for the 4th of the weekend but this place turns out they dont micowave, no firdge to put stuff in to least have  basic stuff keep while stay here. overall this okay hotel.

A first stay at this conveniently located hotel. The room was clean, there was minimal amenities, an outside ice dispenser which was free and a beverage vending machine. The lighting in the room was more than adequate. Most importantly it was quiet in spite of the closeness to a freeway entrance and car wash. The staff was efficient and professional. The only negative was that the internet was slow. Also, there was a free microwave in the office as the room did not have a microwave or refrigerator.

Summary Heading: good: very hot water and full flush toilet
Summary: The area around the hotel is very loud and the windows are old letting in much of that outside noise (sirens, yelling) so I did not get much sleep. The parking lot is heavily lit (presumably to keep sketchy folks away from your car) but it also lets a ton of light into the rooms. The linens were sparse. It is across the street from neighborhood walmart if you need anything. It is very loud and the walls are thin. They did have free WiFi, which made me give them a 2/5, instead of 1/5. The hotel looks like it rents by the hour.  Also the hot water was very hot and they have a full flush toilet. I didn't see any bed bugs or roaches (previous review).

No hair dryer. Cold & hot water were reversed. 1 bath towel, 1 hand towel, 1 wash cloth...for 2 people. No bath mat. Hair products extremely poor. No lotion. Had downstairs room. People coming & going all hours of the night, making one wonder what kind of establishment they were running. Will never ever stay there again.

I wouldn't recommend nobody to stay there because the security guard sucks and the manger sucks and he is rude. Cocaroches in the rooms.bathroom sucks. Bed bugs in the beds. Tv sucks.cars gets broken into

For a 2* hotel it easily met my expectations, our room looked like it had recently been painted as it was extremely clean so I was very happy. Bathroom was really clean and no mould or rust marks. Location was a plus for us for convenience to pick up an RV and access to 2 Wal-Mart's all in walking distance."

Summary Heading: Noisy neighborhood poor tv remote not enough towels
Summary: The hotel was in a noisy neighborhood... the remote to the t.v. was possessed as was the second remote even after the rebooted something that was supposed to fix the issue... and for two women there were only two towels and no floor mat... the price was the lowest available but hello it wasn't a cheap stay you should step it up a bit!

Long day of work needed a quick place to rest so i stopped for rest got a room pretty cheap dor about $70 room is okay room get really cold at night u can hear thumping from next door and upstairs it really sucks but i had a a cheap room to stay at tv channels are good has a few movies u can watch from different channel providers
